bs-namespacemanager-desc: Used in [{{canonicalurl:Special:WikiAdmin|mode=ExtensionInfo}} Special:WikiAdmin?mode=ExtensionInfo], description of namespace manager extension
bs-namespacemanager-label: Used in Sidebar, Anchor text for namespace manager
bs-namespacemanager-wrong-name: Error message when namespace contains invalid characters.
bs-namespacemanager-wrong-alias: Error message when namespace alias contains invalid characters.
bs-namespacemanager-alias-exists: Error message when namespace alias is already set for another namespace. $1 - name of the namespace that already has this alias
bs-namespacemanager-ns-exists: Error message for the namespace already exists.
bs-namespacemanager-ns-length: Error message for the namespace must have a minumum length of two characters.
bs-namespacemanager-invalid-id: Error message for no valid namespace ID
bs-namespacemanager-label-content:
Column headline for content namespace
{{Identical|Content namespace}}
bs-namespacemanager-label-searchable:
Column headline for search by default.

*Also used as checkbox label.
bs-namespacemanager-label-pagecount:
Column headline for page count of a namespace.

{{Identical|Page}}
bs-namespacemanager-label-system:
Column headline for whether a namespace is a system namespace.
{{Identical|System}}
bs-namespacemanager-hide-system-ns: Label for checkbox to hide all system namespaces from list
bs-namespacemanager-hide-talk-ns: Label for checkbox to hide all talk namespaces from list
bs-namespacemanager-nsadded: Success message for the namespace has been added.
bs-namespacemanager-nsremoved: Success message for the namespace has been removed.
bs-namespacemanager-nsedited: Success message for the namespace has been edited.
bs-namespacemanager-msgnoteditabledelete: Error message for this namespace is a system namespace and cannot be deleted.
bs-namespacemanager-willdelete: Checkbox label for will be deleted
bs-namespacemanager-willmove:
Checkbox label for will be moved into the namespace NS_MAIN.

*Refers to {{msg-mw|Bs-ns main}}.
bs-namespacemanager-willmovesuffix:
Checkbox label for will be moved into the namespace NS_MAIN with the suffix "$1".

Parameters:
* $1 - is the BlueSpice message "bs-from-something" which includes the name of the namespace which will be deleted
Refers to:
* {{msg-mw|Bs-ns main}}
bs-namespacemanager-deletewarning: Text for are you sure that you want to delete this namespace? Deleting a namespace cannot be undone.
bs-namespacemanager-pagepresent:
Headline for pages in this namespace:
Headline for checkbox section
bs-namespacemanager-deletens-deletepages:
Text for why a page was deleted. Used as reason for deleting a page.
*$1 is the name of the namespace which was deleted.
log-name-bs-namespace-manager: Used in [[Special:Log]], title of the log type
log-description-bs-namespace-manager: Used in [[Special:Log]], description of the log type
logeventslist-bs-namespace-manager-log: Namespace manager log option label on [[Special:Log]]
logentry-bs-namespace-manager-create:
Log message about the creation of a new namespace.
Parameters:
* $4 - name of the namespace
logentry-bs-namespace-manager-modify:
Log message about changes in the settings of a namespace.
Parameters:
* $4 - name of the namespace
logentry-bs-namespace-manager-rename:
Log message about changes of the name of a namespace.
Parameters:
* $4 - old name of the namespace
* $5 - new name of the namespace
logentry-bs-namespace-manager-remove:
Log message about the removal of a namespace.
Parameters:
* $4 - name of the namespace
bs-namespacemanager-ns-config-saved: Dialog box text that tells the user that the namespace configuaration has successfully been saved
bs-namespacemanager-error-ns-config-not-:
Dialog box text that tells the user that the namespace configuaration could not be saved to file "$1"

Parameters:
* $1 - is the path to the config file
apihelp-bs-namespace-store-description:
Describes the API endpoint that lists namespaces.
{{doc-apihelp-description|bs-namespace-store}}
apihelp-bs-namespace-store-summary:
Describes the API endpoint that lists namespaces.
{{doc-apihelp-summary|bs-namespace-store}}
apihelp-bs-namespace-tasks-description:
Describes the API endpoint that allows manipulation of the namespace configuration.
{{doc-apihelp-description|bs-namespace-tasks}}
apihelp-bs-namespace-tasks-summary:
Describes the API endpoint that allows manipulation of the namespace configuration.
{{doc-apihelp-summary|bs-namespace-tasks}}
action-namespacemanager-viewspecialpage:
label for permission denied page, show user which page have been blocked
{{doc-action|namespacemanager-viewspecialpage}}
bs-namespacemanager-nodeletetalk: Error message shown when a user tries to delete a talk namespace
bs-namespacemanager-label-istalk:
Label for column in the grid that shows if namespace is a talk namespace
{{Identical|Talk}}
right-namespacemanager-viewspecialpage:
Grants access to the special page [[Special:NamespaceManager]].
{{doc-right|namespacemanager-viewspecialpage}}
bs-namespacemanager-hide-talk-label: Checkbox label to hide talk namespages from the grid
bs-namespacemanager-labelnsalias: label for input field for namespace alias
